verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen,<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> to a <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4148>instruction.<s%> Pay <S%H7181>attention<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H998>understanding;<s%>
for I <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H2896>sound<s%> <S%H3948>learning.<s%> <S%H5800>Don't<s%> forsake my <S%H8451>law.<s%>
For I was a <S%H1121>son<s%> to my <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and an <S%H3173>only<s%> child in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of my <S%H517>mother.<s%>
He <S%H3384>taught<s%> <S%H559>me,<s%> and said to <S%H3820>me:<s%> "Let your heart <S%H8551>retain<s%> my <S%H1697>words.<s%> <S%H8104>Keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H2421>live.<s%>
<S%H7069>Get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> <S%H7069>Get<s%> <S%H998>understanding.<s%> <S%H7911>Don't<s%> forget, neither <S%H5186>swerve<s%> from the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H5800>Don't<s%> forsake <S%H8104>her,<s%> and she will preserve <S%H157>you.<s%> Love <S%H5341>her,<s%> and she will keep you.
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is <S%H7225>supreme.<s%> <S%H7069>Get<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> <S%H7075>Yes,<s%> though it costs all your possessions, get <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
<S%H5549>Esteem<s%> <S%H5549>her,<s%> and she will exalt <S%H3513>you.<s%> She will bring you to honor, when you embrace <S%H2263>her.<s%>
She will <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H7218>head<s%> a <S%H3880>garland<s%> of <S%H2580>grace.<s%> She will <S%H4042>deliver<s%> a <S%H5850>crown<s%> of splendor to <S%H8597>you.<s%>"
<S%H8085>Listen,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H561>sayings.<s%> The <S%H8141>years<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%> will be <S%H7235>many.<s%>
I have <S%H3384>taught<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> I have <S%H1869>led<s%> you in <S%H3476>straight<s%> <S%H4570>paths.<s%>
When you <S%H3212>go,<s%> your <S%H6806>steps<s%> will not be <S%H3334>hampered.<s%> When you <S%H7323>run,<s%> you will not <S%H3782>stumble.<s%>
Take firm <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction.<s%> <S%H7503>Don't<s%> let her go. <S%H5341>Keep<s%> <S%H2416>her,<s%> for she is your life.
<S%H935>Don't<s%> enter into the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> <S%H833>Don't<s%> walk in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of evil <S%H7451>men.<s%>
<S%H6544>Avoid<s%> <S%H5674>it,<s%> and don't pass by <S%H7847>it.<s%> Turn from <S%H5674>it,<s%> and pass on.
For they <S%H3462>don't<s%> sleep, unless they do <S%H7489>evil.<s%> Their <S%H8142>sleep<s%> is taken <S%H1497>away,<s%> unless they make someone <S%H3782>fall.<s%>
For they <S%H3898>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2555>violence.<s%>

But the <S%H734>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is like the <S%H5051>dawning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> that <S%H215>shines<s%> <S%H1980>more<s%> and more until the <S%H3559>perfect<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is like <S%H653>darkness.<s%> They <S%H3045>don't<s%> know what they stumble <S%H3782>over.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7181>attend<s%> to my <S%H1697>words.<s%> <S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to my <S%H561>sayings.<s%>
Let them not <S%H3868>depart<s%> from your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> <S%H8104>Keep<s%> them in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of your <S%H8432>heart.<s%>
For they are <S%H2416>life<s%> to those who <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H4832>them,<s%> and health to their whole <S%H1320>body.<s%>
<S%H5341>Keep<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> with all <S%H4929>diligence,<s%> for out of it is the <S%H8444>wellspring<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
Put <S%H5493>away<s%> from yourself a <S%H6143>perverse<s%> <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> Put <S%H3891>corrupt<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> far from <S%H7368>you.<s%>
Let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> straight <S%H5227>ahead.<s%> Fix your <S%H6079>gaze<s%> directly before <S%H3474>you.<s%>
Make the <S%H4570>path<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H1870>level.<s%> Let all of your ways be <S%H3559>established.<s%>
<S%H5186>Don't<s%> turn to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left.<s%> <S%H5493>Remove<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
